text: Wo ruci qishi ni [mu sheng] wo mingling zhong de yi xiang qishi. Ni yuanlai bing bu zhidao jingdian shi shenme? Xinyang shi shenme? Dan wo yi shi ta [“gulanjing”] chengwei guangming, jie ci yindao wo de pu ren zhong wo suo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao. Ni dique zhengzai yindao [renlei] zunxing zhengdao [zhu][yisilan jiao],
